data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God, we pray for the believers in Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 14,979 believers in the state of Trentino-Alto Adige to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Trentino-Alto Adige
location.people_groups_list: Fula Jalon, Pomak, Tajik, Kyrgyz, Arab, Sudanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Fula Jalon (3,900), Pomak (2,400), Tajik (4,900), Kyrgyz (900), Arab, Sudanese (2,000)
